TextView.android:text: This app is developed by Haritha and Kiran as a final project for the Android course :) \n\n Expense Tracker is an application that allows its users to save and track their daily expenses. It takes inputs from user such as annual income, desired savings and maximum daily expense and notifies user if by changing the respective items on the home screen. It also allows user to add their own categories to add expenses and delete if not needed by providing more flexibility to user. User can also track the expenses or savings by viewing reports generated according to the range of dates provided. There are also few functionalities to change password, to remember user login state by eliminating the need of logging in every time.
